bookSourceComment: //无名25.05.04，源社区群友解决加密
header: {"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 14; 2312DRAABC) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/132.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36"}

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var doc = result;
java.log("----" + baseUrl);
var finalContent = ""; 
try {
    var contentText = "";
    
    
    if (doc) {
        var contentElement = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(doc).select(".content");
        if (contentElement) {
            contentText = contentElement.text().trim();
        } else {
            contentText = "";
        }
    } else {
        // throw new Error("HTML parsing failed");
        contentText = "【无法解析HTML】"; 
    }
    // 解密
    var decryptedText = "";
    var atob = function(val) {
        try {
            return String(java.base64Decode(val, "ISO-8859-1"));
        } catch (e) {
            // java.log("Base64 解码失败 for: " + val + ", Error: " + e);
            return "";
        }
    };
    function _0x5472bc(_0x29b0fa) {
        return _0x29b0fa.slice().reverse();
    }
    function _0x17ef6d(aR) {
        var _0xe4c1a0 = '';
        try {
            for (var _0x15efce = 0; _0x15efce < aR.length; _0x15efce++) {
                _0xe4c1a0 += String.fromCharCode(aR[_0x15efce]);
            }
            return decodeURIComponent(escape(_0xe4c1a0));
        } catch(e) {
            // java.log("字节转字符串或 decodeURIComponent 出错: " + e);
            return _0xe4c1a0;
        }
    }
    function _0x325420(encodedData, encodedKey) {
        try {
            var keyBytesRaw = atob(encodedKey).split('').map(c => c.charCodeAt(0));
            if (!keyBytesRaw || keyBytesRaw.length === 0) throw new Error("解码后的密钥为空");
            var keyBytesProcessed = _0x5472bc(keyBytesRaw);
            if (!keyBytesProcessed || keyBytesProcessed.length === 0) throw new Error("处理后的密钥为空");

            var dataBytesRaw = atob(encodedData).split('').map(c => c.charCodeAt(0));
            if (!dataBytesRaw) throw new Error("解码后的数据为空");

            var decryptedBytes = dataBytesRaw.map((byte, index) => byte ^ keyBytesProcessed[index % keyBytesProcessed.length]);
            return _0x17ef6d(decryptedBytes);
        } catch (e) {
            // java.log("解密函数 _0x325420 内部错误: " + e);
            return "【解密过程出错】"; // 返回错误指示
        }
    }
    var paramRegex = /await\s+_0x\w+\('(.+?)','(.+?)'\)/;
    var ar = result.match(paramRegex);
    if (ar && ar[1] && ar[2]) {
        var encodedDataParam = ar[1];
        var encodedKeyParam = ar[2];
        // java.log("提取到加密参数，准备解密...");
        // --- 调用解密函数 ---
        decryptedText = _0x325420(encodedDataParam, encodedKeyParam);
        // java.log("解密后文本长度: " + decryptedText.length);
    } else {
        java.log("未能从 HTML 中用正则匹配到解密所需的参数");
        decryptedText = "【未能提取加密参数】"; // 设置错误提示
    }

    // --- 拼接结果
    finalContent = contentText + "\n\n" + decryptedText; 

} catch (e) {
    java.log("错误: " + e);
    finalContent = "【规则执行出错: " + e + "】"; // 在最终输出中包含错误信息
}
result = finalContent; 
</js>
ruleContent.nextContentUrl:
<js>
var nextChapterUrl = null; 
try {    
    var doc = result;
    if (!doc) {        
        throw new Error("HTML 解析失败"); 
    }        
    var nextLink = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(doc).select("a:containsOwn(下─章)");
    if (nextLink) {        
        var onclickValue = nextLink.attr("onclick");
        if (onclickValue) {                        
            var idRegex = /location\.href='([^']+)\.idx'/;
            var idMatch = onclickValue.match(idRegex);
            if (idMatch && idMatch[1]) {
                var chapterIdPart = idMatch[1];                 
                var checkRegex = /_\d+$/; 
                if (checkRegex.test(chapterIdPart)) {                                      
                    var newFileName = chapterIdPart + ".html";                                        
                    var lastSlashRegex = /\/[^/]*$/;
                    if (typeof baseUrl === 'string') {                        
                        nextChapterUrl = baseUrl.replace(lastSlashRegex, "/" + newFileName);
                        
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
} catch (e) {    
    nextChapterUrl = null; 
}
result = nextChapterUrl;
</js>

const groupDatas = [];

function deviceType() {
  try {
    return!!java.androidId();
  } catch (e) {
    return false;
  }
}
let device = deviceType()? 'android' : 'ios';
if (device == 'android' && (String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com')))) {
    function groupQuery() {
        const url = base_url + "/group_name?cookie={{String(cookie.getCookie('fanqienovel.com') || java.getCookie('fanqienovel.com'))}}";
        const res = java.ajax(url);
        const data = JSON.parse(res).data;

        data.forEach(group => {
            let key;
            for (key in group) {
                groupDatas.push({
                    "title": key,
                    "url": base_url +"/bookshelf2?page={{page}}&book_ids=" + group[key].join(","),
                    "style": {
                        "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                        "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
                    }
                });
            }
        });

        if (groupDatas.length % 2 !== 0) {
            groupDatas.push({
                "title": "--",
                "url": "",
                "style": {
                    "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                    "layout_flexBasisPercent": 0.45
                }
            });
        }
    }

    try {
    	java.longToast("请稍等,正在更新分组数据!");
    // 用户信息
    const userUrl = base_url + '/fquser?sessionid={{String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid"))}}';
    const userRes = java.ajax(userUrl);
    const userInfo = JSON.parse(userRes).data.name;

    infoData = [
        {
            "title": `${userInfo}个人中心`,
            "url": "",
            "style": {
                "layout_flexGrow": 1,
                "layout_flexBasisPercent": 1
            }
        }
    ];
    groupQuery();
    } catch (e) {
    java.longToast("网络错误或登录失效或阅读版本过低，请重新登录番茄重试！");
    }

}

info = `  🎚当前服务器：${base_url}
🪄书山账号：${key}
🎴当前来源：${sources}
🗂当前模式：${tab}\n`
if (tab =='听书') {info = info+	'🔊当前音色：'+ getArguments(source.getVariable(),'tone_id',String(source.bookSourceComment))+'\n'+book_tts+'\n‎';}
if (`${tags}`) {info = info +  `🕹分类：${tags}\n`};
if (`${role}`) {info = info +  `🎗书籍主角：${role}\n`};
if (`${last_chapter_title}`) {info = info +  `🎯最新章节：${last_chapter_title}\n`};
if (`${last_chapter_update_time}`) {info = info +  `⏳更新时间：${last_chapter_update_time}\n`};
if (`${word_number}`) {info = info +  `📝书籍字数：${word_number}\n`};
if (`${status}`) {info = info +  `💥书籍状态：${status}\n`};
if (`${score}`) {info = info +  `✨书籍评分：${score}\n`};
if (`${media}`) {info = info +  `📌出版媒体：${media}\n`};
if (`${abstract}`) {info = info +  `‎
📚书籍简介：
${abstract}\n`};
if (`${book_review}`) {info = info +  `‎\n${book_review}\n`};
if (`${copyright_info}`) {info = info +  `📍${copyright_info}`};

<js>
let res =java.hexDecodeToString(result).split('书山融合2.1');

let tab = res[1];
let title = res[2];
let sources = res[3];
let tone_id = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'tone_id',String(source.bookSourceComment));
let base_url = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'server',String(source.bookSourceComment));
let key = '';
try {
	key = String(cookie.getCookie(base_url)) || String(java.getCookie(base_url));
	key = getKey(key);
 } catch (e) {key='';}
        
        
let device,device_type;
try {
    device = java.androidId();
    device_type='安卓';
} catch (e) {
    try{
device = java.deviceID();
device_type='苹果';
}catch (e) {device = '';
device_type='安卓';
}
}


let content_url;
if (tab=='小说') {
	content_url= `/content?item_id=${item_id}&device=${device}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&key=${key}`;
 } 
 else if (tab=='听书') {
 	 	content_url= `/audio?item_id=${item_id}&device=${device}&tone_id=${tone_id}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&key=${key}`;
 	} else if (tab=='漫画') {
 		 	content_url=	`/pic?item_id=${item_id}&device=${device}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&key=${key}`;
 		} else if (tab=='短剧') {
 		content_url=	`/video?item_id=${item_id}&device=${device}&source=${sources}&tab=${tab}&key=${key}`;
 			}
 let data = java.ajax(base_url+content_url);
 try {
if (JSON.parse(data).msg) {
	java.toast(JSON.parse(data).msg);
	}}catch (e) {}
let content = JSON.parse(data).content;
if (device_type=='安卓' && tab  == '短剧'){
	data = {'content':`【右上角刷新】开启播放(下一集请切换下一章刷新)\n播放直链：\n${content}`}
	data = JSON.stringify(data);
	 if (book.durChapterIndex===chapter.index){
	 //let b64 = java.base64Encode(generateVideoPage(title,content));
	// let dataUrl = `data:text/html;base64,${b64}`;
	// 	java.startBrowser(dataUrl,title);
	 	java.startBrowser(content,title);
	 	java.toast('正在加载视频...');
	}};

data;
</js>

var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {  
  if(param==null) return '';  
  var paramStr = '';  
  var t = typeof (param);  
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {  
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);  
  } else {  
    for (var i in param) {  
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);

};

let media;

if (String(key).startsWith("m:")||String(key).startsWith("m：")) {
  media = "漫画"
  key = key.slice(2)
  }else if (String(key).startsWith("t:")||String(key).startsWith("t：")) {
  media = "听书"
  key = key.slice(2)
} else if (String(key).startsWith("d:")||String(key).startsWith("d：")) {
  media = "短剧"
  key = key.slice(2)
} else if (String(key).startsWith("x:")||String(key).startsWith("x："))  {
	media = "小说"
  key = key.slice(2)
	} else {
	media = getArguments(source.getVariable(),'media',String(source.bookSourceComment));
	}
if (key.includes('@')) {
  const parts = key.split('@');
  key = parts[0];
  sources = parts[1] || sources;
}
	`${base_url}/search?title=${key}&tab=${media}&source=${sources}&key=${key2}`
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
 if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)){
name=`{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@tag.h1.0@text}}`
author=`{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.1@a@text}}`
kind=`{{book.kind}}`
word=`{{book.wordCount}}`
last=`{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.0@text##最新：}}`
info = ` 
📖 书名：{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@tag.h1.0@text}}
👤 作者：{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.1@a@text}}
📜 篇幅：{{@@class.props_box@tag.ul@li.1@text}}
🔖 标签：{{@@class.tag_box@li[0:-3]@a@text##\n}}
🗿 肉量：{{@@class.props_box@ul@li.0@text}}
✏  评分：{{@@class.score_box@span@text}}
🕰 最新：{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.0@text##最新：}}
👁 观看：{{@@class.props_box@ul@li.2@text}}
❤️ 收藏：{{@@class.props_box@ul@li.3@text}}
🏷 简介：{{@@class.brief@text##小说简介：}}`;
}else if(baseUrl.match(/comic/)){
	name=`{{book.name}}`
		author=`{{book.author}}`
		kind=`{{book.kind}}`
		word=``
		last=``
		info=` 
📖 书名：{{book.name}}
👤 作者：{{book.author}}
🏷 简介：{{book.intro}}`;

	}else if (baseUrl.match(/video/)) {
		name=`{{$.model.title}}`
		author=`{{$.model.keywords}}`
		kind=`{{$..tags}}`
		word=``
		last=``
		info=`{{$..brief}}`
		}else if (baseUrl.match(/audio/)) {
   name=`{{$.model.title}}`
		author=`{{$.model.authors}}`
		kind=`{{java.getString('.finished')==1?"完结":"连载"}},{{$..categories}}`
		word=``
		last=`{{$..latestUpdate}}`
		info=`{{$..brief}}`
}
data = {
    name: name,
    author: author,
    kind: kind,
    word:word,
    last: last,
    info: info
};

JSON.stringify(data);
</js>

ruleContent.content:
if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)){ var document = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result); var limit_box = document.select("div.limit_code_box"); if (limit_box.hasClass("hide")) { document.select("div.line"); } else if( limit_box && ! limit_box.hasClass("hide") ){ result = "请刷新重试或点开上方章节链接进行验证"; }}else if(baseUrl.match(/comic/)){ result=java.getString("#content@img@src"); result.split('\n').map(x=>``).join('\n'); }else if(baseUrl.match(/video/)){ if (book['durChapterIndex'] == chapter['index']) { b64 = java['base64Encode'](`

{{$.model.title}}

⌚️ 时长：{{$.model.durationFormat}}

📆 日期：{{$.model.onlineTime##T|.000.*## }}

🎥 播放：{{$.model.viewCount}}次

📩 收藏：{{$.model.collectCount}}

🕵 片商：{{$.model.authors}}

👤 上传：{{$.model.uploader}}

🔖 标签：{{$.model.categories}},{{$.model.tags}}

🏷 简介：{{$.model.brief}}

`); dataUrl = 'data:text/html;base64,' + b64; java['startBrowser'](dataUrl, title); java['toast']('正在加载视频\n视频加载较慢，请耐心等待'); } '【刷新正文】播放\n✅直链:\n' + `{{$.model.url}}`; }else if (baseUrl.match(/audio/)) { java.getString('{$.model.url}') }

'{{getUrl()}}api/audio/app/audio/intro?id={{$.id}}'
}

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
 if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)){
	book.type = 8;
 java.toast('当前为小说模式🧾'); 
 var data = [];
var list = java.getElements(".catalog_ul li");
var n = src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/) ? parseInt(src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/)[1]) : 0;
var m = list.length;
var k = /menu/.test(list) && /展开章节/.test(list) ? 1 : 0;
//java.log(n+'/'+m+'/'+k);
for (i in list) {
    if (i >= m - n - k) {break}
    var list_i = /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? list[i].select("span")[0] : list[i].select("a");
    data.push({
        title: String(list_i.text()).replace(book.name, "").replace(/^\s+|\snew/g, ""),
        link: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? "" : `${getUrl()}${list[i].select("a").attr("href")}`,
        time: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0])  ? "" : String(list[i].select("span").text()).replace(/游客/g,'✨').replace(/币/g,'💰').replace(/new\s/g,''),
        vol: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false,
        vip: /币/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false
    });
}
data;
 }else if (baseUrl.match(/comic/)) {
	book.type = 64;
 java.toast('当前为漫画模式🧾'); 
 var data=[]
var list = java.getElements(".catalog_ul li");
var n = src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/) ? parseInt(src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/)[1]) : 0;
var m = list.length;
var k = /menu/.test(list) && /展开章节/.test(list) ? 1 : 0;
//java.log(n+'/'+m+'/'+k);
for (i in list) {
    if (i >= m - n - k) {break}
    var list_i = /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? list[i].select("span")[0] : list[i].select("a");
    data.push({
        title: String(list_i.text()).replace(book.name, "").replace(/^\s+|\snew/g, ""),
        link: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? "" : `${getUrl()}${list[i].select("a").attr("href")}`,
        time: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0])  ? "" : String(list[i].select("span").text()).replace(/游客/g,'✨').replace(/币/g,'💰').replace(/new\s/g,''),
        vol: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false,
        vip: /币/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false
    });
}
data;
	}else if (baseUrl.match(/video/)) {
    book.type = 8;
    java.toast('当前为视频模式🧾');
  var data = []
    name=java.getString('{$..title}')
    href=`${getUrl()}api/video/app/video/intro?force=false&id=`+java.getString('{$.model.id}')+`&viewId=`+new Date().getTime() + Math.round(Math.random() * (9999 - 1000) + 1000);

 data.push({
    	title:name,
    	link:href	  		
    });
 data
  }else if (baseUrl.match(/audio/)) {
    book.type = 32;
    java.toast('当前为听书模式🧾');
    var data = []
    name=java.getString('{$..title}')
    href=`${getUrl()}api/audio/app/audio/chapter?force=false&id=`+java.getString('{$..latestReadChapterId}')+`&offset=0&viewId=`+new Date().getTime() + Math.round(Math.random() * (9999 - 1000) + 1000);
 data.push({
    	title:name,
    	link:href	  		
    });
 data

    
}
 </js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
var url = getUrl().replace(/\/$/,'')
//java.log(url)
//处理强制登录
var nn = String(cookie.getCookie(url));
var coks = nn.split('; '); 
ckk = coks.filter(item => !item 
.startsWith("lf_reader_num")).join('; ');
cookie.setCookie(url,ckk);

//自动处理验证
let html = src;

function txt(sr) {
    let text;
    if (src.includes("滑动验证")) {
        let headers = {
             'User-Agent': "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/58.0.3029.110 Safari/537.36",
            "Referer": baseUrl
        };
        try {
            let s = src.match(/src=\"(\/huadong[^"]+)/)[1];
            let sr = java.get(url + s, headers).body()
            eval(sr.match(/(key=\".+?,value=\"[^;]+?\;)/)[1]);
            let va = getval(value);
            let codeul = url + sr.match(/([^"]+yanzheng_huadong\.php[^"]+)/)[1] + `${key}&value=${va}`;
            let ck = java.get(codeul, headers);
            java.log("验证Cookie：" + JSON.stringify(ck.cookies()));
            java.toast("检测到验证,尝试自动处理……");
            let tx = java.ajax(baseUrl);
            html = tx;
            text = java.getString('.read-content@html', tx);
        } catch (error) {
            java.log(error);
            text = "自动验证失败，请重试!";
        }
    } else {
        text = java.getString('.read-content@html', src);
    }
    return text;
}

let text = txt(html);

//处理重新获取文本时可能会出现的错误。
let retryCount = 0;
const maxRetries = 3;
let result;
while (retryCount < maxRetries) {
    if (text != false && text !== "") {
        result = text;
        break;
    } else {
        retryCount++;
        text = txt(html);
        Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(400);
        java.toast(`未获取到文本，正在重试...（当前第${retryCount}次重试）`);
    }
}

if (retryCount === maxRetries) {
    result = "重试三次仍然未获取到文本，请检查网络状况。"
}
result;
</js>

if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (cookie.getCookie(Get('url')).includes('user')) {
        login(Put(JSON.stringify('【登录提示】\n\n┏┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┓\n┋┋' + '\n账号：' + Account + '\n┋┋' + '\n❤️登录成功❤️\n┋┋' + '\n┗┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┛')));
    } else {
        Login();
    }
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) {
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('我的收藏', `{{Get('url')}}/dynamic/user/subscription?page={{page}}`, 1, 0.45, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('最近阅读', `{{Get('url')}}/dynamic/user/history?page={{page}}`, 1, 0.45, false));
    }
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '月点击',

    '更新日'
];
orderby = [
    '?orderBy=monthlyCount',

];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/show${orderby[i]}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}

headers={

exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('账号：');
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (cookie.getCookie(Get('url')).includes('auth=')) {
        login(Put(JSON.stringify('【登录提示】\n\n┏┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┓\n┋┋' + '\n账号：' + Account + '\n┋┋' + '\n❤️登录成功❤️\n┋┋' + '\n┗┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅━┅┛')));
    } else {
        Login();
    }
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) {
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('我的收藏', `{{Get('url')}}/plugin.php?id=jameson_manhua&c=index&a=store&page={{page}}`, 1, 0.45, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('阅读记录', `{{Get('url')}}/plugin.php?id=jameson_manhua&c=index&a=store&type=lishi&page={{page}}`, 1, 0.45, false));
    }
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
J = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(Get('url')));
type = J.select('[data-field="category_id"]');
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
Jindu = `{{get('jindu',Get('o'))}}`;
Shuxing = `{{get('shuxing',Get('p'))}}`;
Odfie = `{{get('odfie',Get('q'))}}`;
for (j in type) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/plugin.php?id=jameson_manhua&c=index&a=ku${String('&category_id=' + type[j].attr('data-value')).replace(/&category_id=empty/, '')}${Jindu}${Shuxing}&odfie=${Odfie}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(type[j].text(), url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (type.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (type.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(90, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>

    '全部','神幻','女主','韩漫','百合','修真','恐怖','耽美',
    '穿越','悬疑','真人','古风','科幻','热血','霸总','恋爱',
    '生活','后宫','搞笑','校园'
];

    '全部','神幻','女主','韩漫','百合','修真','恐怖','耽美',
    '穿越','悬疑','真人','古风','科幻','热血','霸总','恋爱',
    '生活','后宫','搞笑','校园'
];
Area = `{{get('area',Get('o'))}}`;
End = `{{get('end',Get('q'))}}`;
for (j in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/booklist?cate=${link[j]}&area=${Area}&end=${End}&page={{page}}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[j], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (kind.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
v = String(source.getVariable()).split(",");
x=v[2]
 if (baseUrl.match(/novel/)){
name=`{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@tag.h1.0@text}}`
author=`{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.1@a@text}}`
kind=`{{book.kind}}`
word=`{{book.wordCount}}`
last=`{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.0@text##最新：}}`

try {
    const response = java.ajax(`{{getUrl()}}api/novel/app/novel/comments?novelId=@get:{bid}&sortType=1&page=${x}&rows=5`);
    const jsonData = JSON.parse(response);
    const logOutput = jsonData.data.map(comment => {
        const cleanNickName = comment.updateTime.replace(/T/g,'  ').replace(/\..*/g, '');
        // 根据分数生成星星显示
        const generateStars = (score) => {
            let starCount = Math.min(Math.floor(score / 2), 5);
            let stars = '';
            for (let i = 0; i < 5; i++) {
                stars += i < starCount? '★' : '☆';
            }
            return stars;
        };
        const starDisplay = generateStars(comment.score);
        return `
  [${cleanNickName}]  ${comment.createTimeFormat}
⛄【${comment.nickName}】:👍🏻${comment.score} ${starDisplay}
 ${comment.content}
 \n­
 
`;
    }).join('\n');
    //java.log(logOutput);
} catch (error) {
    const errorLog = {
        [SyntaxError.name]: '数据解析失败: ',
        default: 'AJAX请求失败: '
    }[error.name || 'default'] + error.message;
    java.log(errorLog);
}
info = ` 
📖 书名：{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@tag.h1.0@text}}
👤 作者：{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.1@a@text}}

🔖 标签：{{@@class.tag_box@li[0:-3]@a@text##\n}}
🗿 肉量：{{@@class.props_box@ul@li.0@text}}
✏  评分：{{@@class.score_box@span@text}}
🕰 最新：{{@@class.novel_box@class.info_box@class.item.0@text##最新：}}
👁 观看：{{@@class.props_box@ul@li.2@text}}
❤️ 收藏：{{@@class.props_box@ul@li.3@text}}
🏷 简介：{{@@class.ellipsis@text##小说简介：}}`;
intro=info+`\n­\n【✨评论✨】最新\n­${logOutput}`
info=logOutput?intro:info
}else if(baseUrl.match(/comic/)){
	name=`{{book.name}}`
		author=`{{book.author}}`
		kind=`{{book.kind}}`
		word=``
		last=``
		info=` 
📖 书名：{{book.name}}
👤 作者：{{book.author}}
🏷 简介：{{book.intro}}`;

	}else if (baseUrl.match(/video/)) {
		name=`{{$.model.title}}`

		word=``

		info=`{{$..brief}}`
		}else if (baseUrl.match(/audio/)) {
   name=`{{$.model.title}}`

		kind=`{{java.getString('.finished')==1?"完结":"连载"}},{{$..categories}}`
		word=``

		info=`{{$..brief}}`
}
data = {

    kind: kind,
    word:word,
    last: last,

};

JSON.stringify(data);

var n = src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/) ? parseInt(src.match(/catalog_ul[^\(]+.*-n.*(\d+)\)/)[1]) : 0;
var m = list.length;
var k = /menu/.test(list) && /展开章节/.test(list) ? 1 : 0;
//java.log(n+'/'+m+'/'+k);
for (i in list) {
    if (i >= m - n - k) {break}
    var list_i = /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? list[i].select("span")[0] : list[i].select("a");
    data.push({
        title: String(list_i.text()).replace(book.name, "").replace(/^\s+|\snew/g, ""),
        link: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? "" : `${getUrl()}${list[i].select("a").attr("href")}`,
        time: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0])  ? "" : String(list[i].select("span").text()).replace(/游客/g,'✨').replace(/币/g,'💰').replace(/new\s/g,''),
        vol: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false,
        vip: /币/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false
    });
}
data;
 }else if (baseUrl.match(/comic/)) {
	book.type = 64;

for (i in list) {
    if (i >= m - n - k) {break}
    var list_i = /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? list[i].select("span")[0] : list[i].select("a");
    data.push({

        time: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0])  ? "" : String(list[i].select("span").text()).replace(/游客/g,'✨').replace(/币/g,'💰').replace(/new\s/g,''),
        vol: /img/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false,
        vip: /币/.test(list[i].select("span")[0]) ? true : false
    });
}
data;
	}else if (baseUrl.match(/video/)) {
    book.type = 8;
    //java.toast('当前为视频模式🧾');
  var data = []
    name=java.getString('{$..title}')
    href=`${getUrl()}api/video/app/video/intro?force=false&id=`+java.getString('{$.model.id}')+`&viewId=`+new Date().getTime() + Math.round(Math.random() * (9999 - 1000) + 1000);

 data.push({

 data
  }else if (baseUrl.match(/audio/)) {

searchUrl:
<js>
 v = String(source.getVariable()).split(",");
 x = v[0];
let url = `${getUrl()}`;
let uri="data:;base64,辞晨,{'type':''}";
try {
	if (x == 0){
	url +=	`api/novel/app/novel/search?category=&excludeTags=&keyword=${key}&orderType=0&page=${page}&searchType=1&size=40`
	ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ua});
				}else if (x == 1) {
url +=	`api/comic/app/comic/search?keyword=${key}&orderType=1&page=${page}&searchType=1&size=40`
ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ua});
     }else if (x == 2 ) {
url +=	`api/video/app/video/search?keyword=${key}&orderType=1&page=${page}&searchType=1&size=40`
ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ua});
	   	}else if (x == 3 ) {
url +=	`api/audio/app/audio/search?category=&keyword={{encodeURIComponent(key)}}&orderType=0&page=${page}&searchType=1&size=42`
ss = java.get(url,{	'user-agent': ua});
}
let code = ss.statusCode();
if (code==302||code==301) {
	uri=ss.header("location");
	}
	else if (code == 200) {
	cache.put('urlss', ss.body());
		}else if (code == 502) {
		java.toast('\n'+'👻ip被拉黑了👻')
}
	}catch(err) {
		java.log('💔访问出错💔')
		java.toast('\n💔访问出错，请换接口💔')
	}
	uri;
</js>
